page.title: 12Abergele Town Council
page.content: 1985- Housed in temporary accommodation in a delapidated mobile, not really worthy of a respected and important public body. This is situated in the grounds of Pentre Mawr Hopefully a worthy place will be included in the new complex expected to be built in 1986. Since 1983 The Abergele UDC which included Towyn and Llanddulas separated into Community Councils each having its own chairman or mayor. Abergele obtained permission from Welsh Office to retain title of Mayor. The motto of the old UDC - Heb Dduw Heb Ddim (Without God Without Anything) has been retained with the Regalia of the former Council. Full Council meets on a Monday at 6.30 pm every 6 weeks. Main Council is divided into 2 sections, (a) general problems and finance and (b) planning.
